name: Perl Web Objects ADE
short_description: Compiles a file of reusable, context-overridable html/perl chunks into straight perl CGI. Project file can survive being edited in a wysiwyg html editor (eg Frontpage or Dreamweaver) for artistic polish. Tracks session data. MySQL integration optional.
